meanings.definition: A large bundle or mass of something, especially of money or fabric.
meanings.sent1: The wadmaals of fabric was so heavy to carry.
meanings.sent2: She saved up a wadmaals of money for her vacation.
meanings.sent3: The wadmaals of money in his pocket made him feel like a millionaire.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a wadmaals of joy that filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The wadmaals of colorful balloons decorated the party beautifully.

meanings.definition: To form into a wad or bundle.
meanings.sent1: She carefully wadmaals the papers before putting them in the folder.
meanings.sent2: He likes to wadmaals his socks together before putting them in the drawer.
meanings.sent3: The kids decided to wadmaals their toys to make cleaning up easier.
